about.details:
Incorporated in 2015, Bombay Metrics is engaged in the manufacturing of engineered goods and supply chain management services. The company also offers efficient services in advanced engineering, 3D scanning, rapid prototyping, flow simulation, project management, and quality management. The company is primarily focused on benefiting from the “Make in India” initiative by the GoI by aiding in developing supplier capabilities in India. The company helps its customers in the process of selecting the right manufacturing source and choose the right logistics partners for their operations.

The company has recently been awarded “Best Exporter of the Year” in the Small Business Awards 2021, “Most Trusted Exporter in Western India” by Topgallant Media for International Service Pride Awards 2021, and declared “Winner” at the India 5000 BEST MSME Awards 2021.

Competitive strengths

  • Wide portfolio of product and service offerings.
  • Well established relationship with customers ensuring repeat orders.
  • Experienced management and dedicated employee base.
  • Asset light business model allowing customized business operations.

faqs.question: What is the Bombay Metrics Supply Chain IPO?
faqs.answer:
Bombay Metrics Supply Chain IPO is a SME IPO of 460800 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.29 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹93 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on September 30, 2021, and closes on October 4, 2021.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Bombay Metrics Supply Chain IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Bombay Metrics Supply Chain IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Bombay Metrics Supply Chain IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Bombay Metrics Supply Chain IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Bombay Metrics Supply Chain IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Bombay Metrics Supply Chain IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Bombay Metrics Supply Chain IPO opens on September 30, 2021 and closes on October 4, 2021.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Bombay Metrics Supply Chain IPO?
faqs.answer: Bombay Metrics Supply Chain IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,11,600.

faqs.question: How to apply for Bombay Metrics Supply Chain IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Bombay Metrics Supply Chain IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Bombay Metrics Supply Chain IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Bombay Metrics Supply Chain IPO will be done on Thursday, October 7, 2021, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, October 11, 2021. Check the Bombay Metrics Supply Chain IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Bombay Metrics Supply Chain IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Bombay Metrics Supply Chain IPO listing date is on Tuesday, October 12, 2021.
